Metadata.Title: CVE-2026-21441 affecting package tensorflow for versions less than 2.16.1-10
Metadata.Description: CVE-2026-21441 affecting package tensorflow for versions less than 2.16.1-10. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package tensorflow is earlier than 2.16.1-10, affected by CVE-2026-21441
